channel.title: Oceans on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Oceans on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: US Coast Guard Report on Titan Submersible Implosion Singles Out OceanGate CEO Stockton Rush
item.description: A report on the death of five people in the Titan submersible blames design, maintenance, and inspection flaws for its failure. “It all came back to Mr. Rush,” the head of the investigation told WIRED

item.title: US Coast Guard Report on Titan Submersible Implosion Singles Out OceanGate CEO Stockton Rush
item.description: A report on the death of five people in the Titan submersible blames design, maintenance, and inspection flaws for its failure. “It all came back to Mr. Rush,” the head of the investigation told WIRED

item.title: The First Planned Migration of an Entire Country Is Underway
item.description: The Pacific island nation of Tuvalu could be submerged in 25 years due to rising sea levels, so a plan is being implemented to relocate its population to Australia.
